title: proposal: spec: allow assignment-compatible values in append and copy
body:
As discussed [here](https://groups.google.com/forum/#!searchin/golang-nuts/copy/golang-nuts/C9S-ztnDnI8/SWBNQDh7FQAJ), it might be useful to make the append and copy built-ins somewhat more accepting of different types.

I have made a proposal document here:

https://docs.google.com/document/d/1HilKzERLb521XaG0Lgi6zkkj25VlXqc1oHEUmQ1v3aI
